text: yadi tumhen aaghaat pahunche to un logon ko bhee aisa hee aaghaat pahunch chuka hai. ye yuddh ke din hain, jinhen ham logon ke beech daalate hee rahate hai aur aisa isalie hua ki allaah eemaanavaalon ko jaan le aur tumamen se kuchh logon ko gavaah banae - aur atyaachaaree allaah ko priy nahin hai
